EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Summon Falcon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Falconry Familiar

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Falcon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Falcon companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Grey Owl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Grey Owl companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Raven
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Raven companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Snow Owl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Snow Owl companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon White Falcon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a White Falcon companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability to improve

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Well Rounded I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain +2 to Spot and Listen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability to improve

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Well Rounded II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain +2 to Spot and Listen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Master Falconer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores and benefit from the spell Freedom of Movement. Your active Falcon attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown on Death From Above.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Rugged
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Practiced Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] to hit with weapons and +[1/2/3] to confirm critical attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Hunter's Knowledge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Animals as a favored enemy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Out in Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[5/10/15] to Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Wanderlust
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[1/2/3] bonus to Balance, Jump and Swim. Rank 3: You gain +1 to Fortitude saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier to hit with Melee and Missile weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Watch the Center
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a +[1/2/3] bonus to Assassinate DC's.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Diving Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack. You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[10/20/30]% damage against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Diving Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Diving Shot
DC.Description: Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Diving Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Diving Strike
DC.Description: Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protect your items or increase your chance of recovering ammunition.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Fletching
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts and throwing weapons. Your ammunition gains a [50/65/80]% chance of returning.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Action Boost: Sprint
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: [30/35/45]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier for damage with Melee and Missile weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Tear Flesh
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your bird attacks now also cause a bleed effect. Bleed: Do 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 60 seconds. This stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Go for the Eyes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that will cause your bird to strike the target for damage, blind them and make them helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go for the Eyes Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Go for the Eyes Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Go for the Eyes Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Go for the Eyes Strike
DC.Description: Deals: +[10/20/30]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% Quality bonus to your hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Eyes of the Eagle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Deadly Instinct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.
Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Trance abilities.

Stance.Name: Deadly Instinct
Stance.Description: Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal +[10/20/30]% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attacks that will cause your bird to rain attacks over an area, damaging and blinding all foes in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Coordinated Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +20% Damage Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 25 seconds

DC.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Strike
DC.Description: Deals: +20% Damage Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Coordinated Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +20% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: You make a ranged attack as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 25 seconds

DC.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Shot
DC.Description: Deals: +20% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: You make a ranged attack as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Expose Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacks from your Hunting Bird also reduce your target's fortification by 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Shared Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Blindness effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Dangerous
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Dangerous or Swift

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dangerous
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Melee power, +25% Competence bonus to hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Swift
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3 Reflex saves, 10 Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Death From Above
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack that will cause your bird to attempt to slay your foes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life, dealing [50/100/200] points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.
DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above Strike
DC.Description: Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life, dealing [50/100/200] points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life, dealing [50/100/200] points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.
DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above Shot
DC.Description: Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life, dealing [50/100/200] points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Melee Falconer Attack: On Hit: You also heal for [5/10/20]% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Healing Amplification applies to the heal, but Spell Power does not. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +[10/30/50]% Damage Ranged Falconer Attack: On Hit: You also heal for [5/10/20]% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Healing Amplification applies to the heal, but Spell Power does not. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Mark the Prey
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that causes your bird to strike the target and mark them, making them more vulnerable to damage for a short period of time.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes, marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 3 minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +50% Damage Ranged Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes, marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 3 minutes
